title: Topic 04 Question 56
body: You use release pipelines in Azure Pipelines to deploy an app. Secrets required be the pipeline are stored as pipeline variables. Logging of commands is enabled for the Azure Pipelines agent.
You need to prevent the values of the secrets from being logged.
options: Store the secrets in the environment variables instead of the pipeline variables.
Pass the secrets on the command line instead of in the pipeline variables.
Apply a prefix of secret to the name of the variables.
Echo the values of the secrets to the command line.
